name: WORKERS WORKING AT WORK
description: "The piece show us the assembly of different objects, with the difference that, using the rotoscopy technique, the faces of all the workers are erased in order to establish a dialogue about how invisible their work is. labor, which has led to poor conditions and practices within the maquilas". From the series (IN)VISIBLE WORKERS. More info: https://egorangelportafolio.weebly.com/invisible-workers.html
